name: Hideout Shootout
description:
Hideout Shootout is a top-down roguelike shooter.

Blast your way through multiple floors of baddies and bosses while collecting loot to increase your chances of survival! Share your top score on the leaderboard to see how you stack up against your friends.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Left-Mouse Button

Roll: Right-Mouse Button

Interact: E

Open Map: Tab

Teleport to previously visited room: While Map is Open Left Click 

Pause: Esc

This game is a solo-developed project and is currently still receiving updates with new features and bug fixes. 

Design/Programming/Art/Animation: Steven Treibly

Music: FicusProsound
